props.Name: Chaos Nova
props.Description: Entropy: Converts counters up randomly

props.Name: Touch of Chaos
props.Description: Ravages target adjacent enemy with a touch of pure entropy, dealing {1} Chaos damage.

props.Name: Sacrifice
props.Description: Destroy target Demon you summoned (control?). Gain {1}% of its remaining Endurance as Essence

props.Name: Mindless Frenzy
props.Description: If target units fails a roll against Mind-Affection, it enters Berserk mode for {info_duration} turns, trying to inflict maximum damage on any unit within reach. Target also receives a {1} Rage Counters.

props.Name: Warp Chains
props.Description: Share Warp counters? Bind up to X enemy units. Whenever one of them is target of a mind-affecting effect, all other units are targeted as well.

props.Name: Beguile
props.Description: Target living creature in clear shot makes a saving throw of Willpower versus {1} against mind control and becomes loyal to the caster if it fails.

props.Name: Extravaganza
props.Description: Choose target cell. All units adjacent to it who fail a standard Mind-Affection roll are forced to turn so as to face it directly.

props.Name: Demon Mark
props.Description: Target classifies as a Demon while under the effect of Demon Mark. Lasts {2} turns.

props.Name: Warp Shock
props.Description: Deals an average of {1} (heavily randomed) Chaos damage to a living unit on chosen cell. Resistance is twice as effective against Warp Shock.

props.Name: Demonic Strength
props.Description: Target gains +{1}% bonus Strength, Willpower and Spellpower as long as it is a Demon.

props.Name: Disintegrate
props.Description: Channels the energies of pure Chaos onto a chosen location, dealing {1} Chaos damage to any unit positioned there.

props.Name: Dominate Demon
props.Description: You control the target as long as it is Demon. It also makes a roll against Mind-Affection each turn to dispel the buff.

props.Name: Chaos Bolt
props.Description: Deals an average of {1} Chaos damage to an enemy in clear shot.

params.Formula: Choose target cell. All units facing it make a roll against mind control.

props.Name: Warp Rift
props.Description: All units facing the chosen location must win a roll against Mind Affection or lose all their remaining Action Points for this round.

props.Name: Touch of Warp
props.Dev_Notes: Random amount of Despair, Hatred and Lust counters... Afflicted unit loses {1}% of Willpower. Cannot be resisted, but must target can make a Reflex roll to avoid the Touch.

props.Name: Chains of Despair
props.Description: Bind up to X enemy units. Whenever one of them is target of a mind-affecting effect, all other units are targeted as well.

props.Name: Chains of Hatred
props.Description: Units share Hatred counters and resulting effects.

props.Name: Mass Madness
props.Description: If target units fails a roll against Mind-Affection, it enters Berserk mode for {info_duration} turns, trying to inflict maximum damage on any unit within reach. Target also receives a {1}% damage bonus.

props.Name: Slave of Lust
props.Description: Each action taken under the effect of Beguile reduces Spirit

props.Name: Touch of Despair
props.Description: Adds {1} Despair counters

props.Name: Touch of Madness
props.Description: Adds {1} Despair counters

props.Name: Euphoria
props.Description: Gain {1} Morale upon being Beguiled. Lose twice as much when the effect wears off.

props.Name: Mesmerize
props.Description: Choose target cell. All units adjacent to it who fail a standard Mind-Affection roll are forced to turn so as to face it directly.

params.Formula: Choose target cell. All units facing it make a roll against mind control.

props.Name: Warp Storm
props.Description: All units facing the chosen location must win a roll against Mind Affection or lose all their remaining Action Points for this round.

props.Name: Warp Shock: Mortifying Despair
props.Description: Deals an average of {1} (heavily randomed) Chaos damage to a living unit on chosen cell. Resistance is twice as effective against Warp Shock.

props.Name: Warp Shock: Burning Hatred
props.Description: Deals an average of {1} (heavily randomed) Chaos damage to a living unit on chosen cell. Resistance is twice as effective against Warp Shock.

props.Name: Warp Shock: Unchained Madness
props.Description: Adds {1} Madness counters

props.Name: Dark Fury
props.Description: Target gains +{1}% bonus Strength as long as it is a Demon.

props.Name: Upgraded Dominate Demon
props.Description: Take back control of a demon

props.Name: Demon Soul
props.Description: Destroy target Demon you summoned (control?). Gain {1}% of its remaining Endurance as Essence

props.Name: Extravaganza: Earsplitting Noise
props.Description: Choose target cell. All units adjacent to it who fail a standard Mind-Affection roll are forced to turn so as to face it directly.

props.Name: Seed of Chaos
props.Dev_Notes: and each turn, the spell converts a random number of those counters into Warp counters
props.Description: Adds random number of counters to the target: up to {1} Blight, up to ({2}/2) Rage, up to {1} Blaze, up to {2} Suffocation, up to {2} Corrosion. Lasts {spell_duration} rounds, but whenever target takes Chaos damage, the spell is applied again and its duration is renewed.

props.Name: Hellfire Wave
props.Description: Deals {1} Chaos damage to all units on the 3 adjacent cells in front of the caster plus the cell 2 spaces away in front.

props.Name: Implode
props.Description: Pure damage based on Warp counters and target's weight

props.Name: Shadow Bolt
props.Description: Deals {1} Shadow damage to an enemy in clear shot.

props.Name: Shadow Flame
props.Description: All units within 1 cell radius from the caster erupt in dark flames, taking {1} Shadow damage.

props.Name: Leap into Darkness
props.Description: Teleport to a target cell with at least {1} Concealment value.

props.Name: Malediction
props.Description: Reduces target's Resistance by {1}%.

props.Name: Curse of Corruption
props.Description: Reduces target's armor item's face value by {1}

props.Name: Curse Weapon
props.Description: Reduces target's main weapon item's damage by {1}. (Damage mod)

props.Name: Haze
props.Actives: Cont Mod Param by Simple Const(Concealment,Concealment, {1})
props.Description: Adds {1} Concealment to the target cell and whatever unit that stands on it. A unit can be hidden by Concealment and missile attacks can miss on it from those without Darkvision.

props.Name: Armor Corrosion
props.Description: Durability will be reduced {2}% more for the cursed armor item.

props.Name: Weapon Corrosion
props.Description: Reduces target's main weapon's damage by {1}

props.Name: Voodoo Curse
props.Description: Binds two units so that whenever damage is dealt to one, the other suffers {1}% of it as well.

props.Name: Cripple
props.Description: Reduces targetASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSEs Attack and Defense by {1}%.

props.Name: Misfortune
props.Dev_Notes: Target's maximum damage becomes equal to its minimum damage, critical strikes are {1}% less effective for it and equally more effective against it. All rolls are {1]% less likely to come out in target's favor.

props.Name: Cloak of Shadows
props.Actives: Cont Mod Param by Simple Const(Concealment,Concealment, {1})
props.Description: Provides {1} Concealment to enchanted unit. A unit can be hidden from sight by Concealment and missile attacks can miss on it.

props.Name: Dark Swarm
props.Description: Unleashes a wave of psychic energy that applies Scare and Hallucination effects on its victims.

props.Name: Enfeeble
props.Description: Reduces target's Action Points by 1 and stamina by {1}.

props.Name: Scare
props.Description: Reduces target's Action Points by 1 and Morale by {1}.

props.Name: Fear
props.Description: Reduces targetASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSEs Spirit by {1}%. Unit will suffer twice as much from effects of Fearsome ability.

props.Name: Hallucinations
props.Description: Reduces target's Action Points by 1 and if it fails a roll against Mind Affecting, also reduces Focus by {1}.

props.Name: Dark Shapes
props.Dev_Notes: Target sees false outlines in the darkness
props.Description: If cast on a cell, will make it appear as if occupied by a Concealed unit. If cast on an ally, will give it Fearsome {1} ability and Concealment {2}. If cast on an enemy, will produce the effect of Hallucinations and Scare.

props.Name: Slumber
props.Description: Target makes a saving throw of Current Focus plus Willpower*2 versus {1} against Sleep. While Asleep, unit will make a roll of Willpower versus the same value every turn and wake up if roll suceeds. Taking non-periodic damage results in an additional roll to dispel Slumber, based on the amount of damage being taken. Target's resistance is reduced by 50% when trying to block Slumber.

props.Name: Fantasm
props.Dev_Notes: wake up if fail
props.Description: Target unit that is Asleep makes a saving throw against instant death.

props.Name: Terror
props.Dev_Notes: RollAgainstStdMindAffectingEachRound;
props.Description: If target fails a standard roll against Mind-Affecting, it panics and will retreat as far away from danger as possible, making another roll to dispel the effect each turn. Winning the original roll still reduces target's Action Points by {1}.

props.Name: Drain Stamina
props.Description: Drains {1} Stamina from the target. Your stamina can exceed the maximum as a result.

props.Name: Mind Rot
props.Description: Reduces targetASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSEs Spellpower, Willpower, Intelligence and Wisdom by {1}%.

props.Name: Fright
props.Description: Reduces target's Action Points by {2} and Morale by {1}.

props.Name: Oblivion
props.Description: Target makes a saving throw of Current Focus plus Willpower*2 versus {1} against Sleep. Target's resistance is reduced by 50% when trying to block Slumber.

props.Name: Shadow Bolt: Darkfire
props.Description: Deals {1} Shadow damage to an enemy in clear shot plus an additional {2}% of Chaos and {3}% of Fire damage.

props.Name: Shadow Bolt: Twilight
props.Description: Deals {1} Shadow damage to an enemy in clear shot and an additional {2}% of Holy damage.

props.Name: Shadow Bolt: Aphotic
props.Description: Deals an amount of Shadow damage to an enemy in clear shot equal to {1} plus {2]% of the sum of Concealment values of yourself and target.

props.Name: Cloak of Terror
props.Description: Provides {1} Concealment to enchanted unit. A unit can be hidden from sight by Concealment and missile attacks can miss on it.

props.Name: Shadow Flame: Aphotic
props.Description: All units within 1 cell radius from the caster erupt in dark flames, taking {1} Shadow damage.

props.Name: Haze Cloud
props.Actives: Cont Mod Param by Simple Const(Concealment,Concealment, {1})
props.Description: Adds {1} Concealment to the target cell and whatever unit that stands on it. A unit can be hidden by Concealment and missile attacks can miss on it from those without Darkvision.

props.Name: Curse of Silence
props.Description: Reduces targetASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSEs Spellpower, Willpower, Intelligence and Wisdom by {1}%.

params.Formula: Target makes a roll of Current Morale plus Spirit*10 versus {1} against instant death. Target's resistance is reduced by 75% when trying to block Terror.

props.Name: Mass Terror
props.Description: If target fails a standard roll against Mind-Affecting, it panics and will retreat as far away from danger as possible, making another roll to dispel the effect each turn.

props.Name: Lethargy
props.Description: Target makes a saving throw of Current Focus plus Willpower*2 versus {1} against Sleep. Target's resistance is reduced by 50% when trying to block Slumber.

props.Name: Blindness
props.Description: Reduces targetASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSEs Attack and Defense by {1}%.

props.Name: Voodoo Curse: Chains of Agony
props.Unique_Id: spells Voodoo Curse: Chains of Agony-6957180525790342682
props.Description: Binds up to {2} units so that whenever damage is dealt to one, the others suffer {1}% of it as well.

props.Name: Shadow Blade
props.Description: Enchanted weapon will deal an additional {1}% as Shadow damage.

props.Name: Drain Focus
props.Description: Drains {1} Focus from the target. Your Focus cannot exceed the maximum as a result.

props.Name: Shadow Shield
props.Description: Attackers receive {1} Shadow damage.

props.Name: Mesmeric Link
props.Description: Hypnotize the target if it fails a roll against Mind-Affecting and enter Channeling mode. At the start of next turn if the Channeling has not been interrupted or the Hypnosis dispelled, drain all Focus from the target and remove the effect.

props.Name: Leap into Twilight
props.Description: Teleport to a target cell with at least {1} Concealment value.

props.Name: Dark Restoration
props.Actives: Cont Mod Param by Simple Const(Concealment,Concealment, {1})
props.Description: Adds {1} Concealment to the target cell and whatever unit that stands on it. A unit can be hidden by Concealment and missile attacks can miss on it from those without Darkvision.

props.Name: Psychic Link
props.Dev_Notes: drain morale? gain essence for target's actions?
props.Description: Target unit that is Asleep makes a saving throw against instant death.

props.Name: Torpor
props.Description: Reduces targetASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSEs Spirit by {1}%. Unit will suffer twice as much from effects of Fearsome ability.

props.Name: Shadow Channel
props.Description: Transforms {1} Focus into {2} Essence. Grants {3} Concealment until end of turn.

props.Name: Fire Bolt
props.Description: Deals {1} Fire damage to an enemy in clear shot.

props.Name: Ice Shard
props.Dev_Notes: Will shatter a Frozen unit!
props.Description: Deals {1} Slashing damage to an enemy in clear shot and converts up to {2} Moist counters into Freeze counters.

props.Name: Thunder Strike
props.Description: Charge counters are released. Deals {1} Lightning damage to all units on the chosen cell, then also {2} Sonic damage to those plus all units in 1 cell radius. Creates {3} Illumination until next unit action.

props.Name: Lightning Bolt
props.Description: Sends forth a discharge that deals {1} Lightning damage to all units in a chosen direction, within {spell_range} cells range. Each unit adjacent to a unit hit by Lightning Bolt receives {2} Charges

props.Name: Gush
props.Description: Deals {1} Bludgeoning damage and applies {2} Moist counters to the target.

props.Name: Fireball
props.Description: Hurls a ball of sizzling flame at chosen cell or object, dealing {1} Fire damage to adjacent targets and applying {2} Blaze counters to them.

props.Name: Gust of Wind
props.Description: Applies {1} Force to all units on the 3 adjacent cells in front of the caster and Wind Effect {2} which removes up to {2} Suffocation counters, then converts up to {2}*2 Ash counters into Suffocation counters.

props.Name: Levitation
props.Description: Target gains {1}-(weight) ft. Lift Height, becoming Airborne (increased Defense and Attack, but cannot normally use non-Flying Move Actions unless has Flying ability)

props.Name: Rime Armor
props.Dev_Notes: Target gains bonus Armor equal to {2}% of its Freeze Counters and will apply up to {1}% of them to melee attackers
props.Description: Target gains {1} Resistance and its units receive {2} Cold damage and {3} Freeze counters on each successful melee attack against it.

props.Name: Whirlwind
props.Dev_Notes: Within the area, ranged attacks with ammo can fail, the less weight their have
props.Description: Creates a swirling mass of air around the caster that applies Wind Effect {1} to all adjacent cells and units there are subject to {2} Force each round, while the caster will be turned clockwise. Within 2 cells distance, ranged attacks with ammo with less than {3} weight can fail.

props.Name: Tidal Wave
props.Dev_Notes: IDEA: crush against Ice Wall!
props.Description: Conjures a wave of raging water that travels forward up to {spell_range} cells, dealing {1} Bludgeoning damage and applies {2} Moist counters to the targets. Creates massive amount of Force that may Push or Knockdown targets.

props.Name: Shock Grasp
props.Description: Transfers all Charge counters to the target and deals {1} Lightning damage to it, plus {2} per Charge counter on it. Reflex roll won by the target may negate the effect.

props.Name: Ice Wall
props.Dev_Notes: Erects a wall of solid ice on a cell with at least 500 space (units will be encased until the wall is destroyed). Wall's maximum Toughness is equal to {2}*Freeze Counters on it and it converts up to {1} Moist counters to Freeze counters and applies {3}% of its Freeze counters to all adjacent units at the start of each new round.
props.Description: Erects a wall of solid ice on a cell with at least 500 space and 50 Moist counters (units will be encased until the wall is destroyed). Wall's maximum Toughness is equal to {2}*Freeze Counters on it and it converts up to {1} Moist counters on it (initial 50) to Freeze counters and applies {3}% of its Freeze counters to all adjacent units at the start of each new round. Units cased in the Ice Wall lose {4}% Endurance per round.

props.Name: Flame Serpent
props.Description: Choose one: Target will leave behind instances of Conflagration (an object spreading Blaze counters) for {1}/2 rounds; or choose up to {1} subsequently adjacent cells and create Conflagration on each of them.

props.Name: Wreathe in Flame
props.Description: Target's weapons will inflict {1} Fire damage and {2} Blaze counters on each attack and its armor - on hit taken. Each round, each of its equipped items will take {3} durability damage (Fire) or deal 10x as much Fire damage to the unit if it is a Natural Weapon or Natural Armor. Lasts {4} turns.

props.Name: Blast of Thunder
props.Description: Creates a pocket of ripping sound around the target, dealing Sonic damage equal to {1} plus {3} for each Charge on the target, then applying Stun {2} (reduces Initiative and Focus). If cast on a Storm Rift, a free Thunder Strike is cast onto it and the Storm Rift is destroyed.

props.Name: Lava Torrent
props.Description: Once completed, the spell will deal {1} Fire and {1} Bludgeoning damage to the units on chosen cell. Each Lava Trap and Magma Pool within {2} distance from the torrent will explode, dealing its normal damage to all units adjacent to it.

props.Name: Lava Trap
props.Dev_Notes: Creates a hidden pool of lava beneath the chosen cell. Each round, it accumulates {1} Lava counters and if a unit with Weight greater than 200-(Lava Counters*5) is standing on the same cell or if there are move than {2} counters, it will explode, dealing {1} Fire damage per Lava counter to the units adjacent to it and transferring all Lava counters to them (split evenly).
props.Description: The ground beneath target cell explodes, splashing seething lava that adds {1} Lava counters to all units or objects that stand on it.

props.Name: Winter's Breath
props.Description: Creates a wave of arctic frost that deals {1} Cold damage and converts up to {2} Moist counters into Encase counters on targets.

props.Name: Liquify
props.Description: Turns up to {1} of targetASCII_OPEN8217ASCII_CLOSEs Frost counters into Moist counters. If the target is an Ice Wall or an Ice creature, it is dealt {2} damage and a number of Moist counters is applied to all adjacent units equal to its Weight divided by the number of units.

props.Name: Storm Cloud
props.Dev_Notes: add rain! increased effect for Lift Height
props.Description: Accumulates Charges each turn

props.Name: Icy Fog
props.Dev_Notes: IDEA: crush against Ice Wall!
props.Description: Conjures a 9x9 field of chilled mist that obscures vision ({2} Concealment) and applies {1} Freeze counters per round to all units within it, plus 2 Moist counters for each Freeze counter.

props.Name: Combustion
props.Description: Adds {1} Blaze counters to the target. Converts up to {2} Lava counters to Blaze counters and up to {2} Encase counters to Lava counters.

props.Name: Deeper Heat
props.Dev_Notes: Add {1} Lava counters to the target
props.Description: Each turn, converts up to {1} Blaze and up to {1} Encase counters to Lava counters on the target, then for each Lava counter, target receives {2} Blaze counters

props.Name: Ray of Frost
props.Description: Sends forth a ray of arctic frost that deals {1} Cold damage to all units in a chosen direction, within {spell_range} cells range. Also applies {2} Freeze counter and converts up to that number Moist counter into Freeze ones.

props.Name: Freeze
props.Dev_Notes: Freeze counters are reducing Initiative modifier by 0.5 and applying Frozen status if result is negative (increased Poison and Slashing/Piercing resistances, reduced Bludgeoning resistance).
props.Description: Applies {1} Freeze counters to the target and converts up to {2} Moist counters into Freeze counters.

props.Name: Ice Nova
props.Description: Sends forth 8 rays of arctic frost that deals {1} Cold damage to all units in a chosen direction, within {spell_range} cells range. Also applies {2} Freeze counter and converts up to that number Moist counter into Freeze ones.

props.Name: Mighty Gale
props.Description: Applies {1} Force to all units on the adjacent cells. If caster is Airborne, the spell also adds {2} Height.

props.Name: Spurt of Flame
props.Description: Releases a wave of blazing fire in front of the caster that inflicts {1} Fire damage and adds counters.

props.Name: Lava Splash
props.Description: The air around you explodes in eldritch flames, dealing {1} Arcane damage to all adjacent units.

props.Name: Ball Lightning
props.Description: Creates a ball of magnetized dust next to the caster that will travel randomly and draw Charge counters from adjacents objects to release them when it explodes at the start on next round, dealing {1} Lightning damage per counter to all adjacent units.

props.Name: Ball Lightning Form
props.Description: Creates a ball of magnetized dust next to the caster that will travel randomly and draw Charge counters from adjacents objects to release them when it explodes at the start on next round, dealing {1} Lightning damage per counter to all adjacent units.

props.Name: Holy Flame
props.Description: Calls down a heavenly fire that deals {1} Holy damage to all units in a 3x3 zone centered on the chosen location.

props.Name: Hope
props.Description: Increases target's Morale by {1}.

props.Name: Blessing
props.Description: Increases target's Attack, Defense and Resistance by {1}% for {2} turns.

props.Name: Clarity
props.Description: Increases target's Focus by {1}.

props.Name: Searing Light
props.Description: Unleashes a cone of light that deals {1} Holy damage to all enemies in an expanding conic area starting with a single adjacent cell in front of you. Applies Illumination {2} to each cell and Blindness (1) to each unit in its path.

props.Name: Martyr
props.Description: Of the two chosen ally units, the first will take {1}% of damage dealt to the second one as Pure damage. Choose two units; {1}% of incoming damage to the first unit will be redirected to the second one as Pure damage.

props.Name: Banish Evil
props.Description: Target Undead, Demon or Treachery-Principle unit is annihilated (leaving no corpse). Resistance counts as double against this spell.

props.Name: Lucent Beam
props.Description: Deals {1} Holy damage to the first unit in chosen line.

props.Name: Lucent Sphere
props.Actives: Self(ParamBonusBuff(Sight Range, 1)); Zone(SpellDmg({1}));Zone( Conditional(facing(source, in front),Blindness({3})));
props.Description: The blinding light of the Sphere applies {1} Light damage to all adjacent units upon cast and Blindness to those of them that are facing you directly, after which it will provide Illumination to adjacent cells and grant you +1 Sight Range for {spell_duration}.

props.Name: Scorching Light
props.Description: Brings a pillar of light onto target cell, dealing {1} Holy damage to any unit stading on it and applying Illumination {2}, as well as Blindness(2) for one round.

props.Name: Exorcism
props.Description: Applies Dispel {2} to all negative buffs on allies (upon successful Spellpower/Mastery roll) and deals {1} Holy damage to Demons and Undead on all adjacent cells, plus additional 50% if they are Summoned.

props.Name: Touch of the Divine
props.Description: Random blessing/curse

props.Name: Armor of Faith
props.Description: Target's Armor and Resistance are increased by {1}% of its current Morale.

props.Name: Light
props.Dev_Notes: Illumination({Spell_Formula})
props.Description: Adds Illumination and removes {1} Concealment from target cell and unit on it, if any, making it easier to get In Sight.

props.Lore: Bolts are the simplest form of any magic, raw aspect energy hurled at an enemy...
props.Name: Sky Bolt
props.Description: Deals {1} Holy damage to an enemy in clear shot.

props.Name: Safeguard
props.Description: Target unit cannot be slain for the duration of the spell.

props.Name: Resurrection
props.Description: Resurrects target ally with 100% Toughness and Morale, 25% of Action Points, {1}% Endurance and {2}% of Focus, Essence and Stamina.

props.Name: Anathema
props.Description: Increases target's Attack, Defense and Resistance by {1}% for {2} turns. Has reverse effect on enemies.

props.Name: Virtue
props.Description: Increases target's Spirit by {1} and Charisma by {2} for {spell_duration} turns.

props.Name: Revelation
props.Description: Increases target's Focus by {1} and Essence by {2}.

props.Name: Delusion
props.Description: Increases target's Focus by {1} and Essence by {2}.

props.Name: Heart of Light
props.Description: Increases target's Morale by {1} and Stamina by {2}.

props.Name: Holy Touch
props.Description: Deals {1} Holy damage to an adjacent enemy.

props.Name: Arms of Faith
props.Description: Each attack will deals an additional {1}% of attacker's current Morale, up to {2} as Holy damage.

props.Name: Retribution
props.Description: Of the two chosen ally units, the first will take {1}% of damage dealt to the second one as Pure damage.

props.Lore: Bolts are the simplest form of any magic, raw aspect energy hurled at an enemy...
props.Name: Sky Bolt: Skyfall
props.Description: Deals {1} Holy damage to an enemy in clear shot. Has additional 1 range and does not require Clear Shot or Vision to cast.

props.Lore: Bolts are the simplest form of any magic, raw aspect energy hurled at an enemy...
props.Name: Sky Bolt: Moonlight
props.Description: Deals {1} Holy damage to an enemy in clear shot plus additional {2}% as Shadow damage. Drains {3} Focus from the target.

props.Name: Holy Touch: Cure the Righteous
props.Unique_Id: spells Holy Touch: Cure the Righteous4615423249220937876
props.Description: Perhaps as a generic skill for all Redemption damage spells? Deals {1} Holy damage to an adjacent enemy.

props.Name: Souls' Salvation
props.Description: Target Undead, Demon or Treachery-Principle unit makes a saving throw of Willpower against Disintegration.

props.Name: Righteous Fury
props.Description: Each attack will deals an additional {1}% of Holy damage.

props.Name: Light: Pale
props.Description: Units standing on a cell under Pale Light effect lose {2}% of Initiative and Resistance.

props.Lore: Bolts are the simplest form of any magic, raw aspect energy hurled at an enemy...
props.Name: Sky Bolt: Pale
props.Description: Deals {1} Holy damage to an enemy in clear shot plus additional {2}% as Death damage. Removes 1 Action point and 3 Stamina if target fails a Fortitude roll.

props.Name: Wings of Light
props.Actives: AddPropBuff(@, standard passives, Flying);AddPropBuff(@, actives, Short Flight);
props.Description: The blinding light of the Sphere applies {1} Light damage to all adjacent units upon cast and Blindness to those of them that are facing you directly, after which it will provide Illumination to adjacent cells and grant you +1 Sight Range for {spell_duration}.

props.Name: Impeding Brightness
props.Description: Adds Illumination and removes {1} Concealment from target cell and unit on it, if any, making it easier to get In Sight.

props.Name: Rest in Peace
props.Description: Applies Dispel {2} to all negative buffs on allies (upon successful Spellpower/Mastery roll) and deals {1} Holy damage to Demons and Undead on all adjacent cells, plus additional 50% if they are Summoned.

props.Name: Heal
props.Description: Restores up to {1} Endurance and half as much Toughness.

props.Name: Heat Wave
props.Description: Releases a blazing hot wind in a spray in front of the caster removes up to {2} Moist and Frost counters or inflicts {1} Fire damage minus {3} for each Moist or Frost counter on the target.

props.Name: Stone Skin
props.Actives: AddParamBuff(Stone Skin,Armor|Elemental Resistances|Physical Resistances,{1});AddParamBuff(Stone Skin,Initiative Modifier,-{2})
props.Description: Increases all of your Natural Resistances by {3}, Armor by {1} but decreases your Initiative by {2}%. Lasts for {spell_duration} turns.

props.Name: Stone Boulder
props.Description: A massive stone boulder falls down onto chosen location, who occupant makes a Reflex roll to evade the spell, which otherwise deals {1} Bludgeoning damage and will knock them down they win a roll of Mass versus {1}.

props.Name: Cure
props.Description: Restores up to {1} Endurance

props.Name: Fortify
props.Actives: Cont Mod Param by Simple Const(Fortified,Toughness,{1});
props.Dev_Notes: retain c_ value: AddParam(C_Toughness, {1}*(100-({source_c_Toughness}/{source_Toughness})*100));
props.Description: Targets receives {1} bonus Toughness for {2} rounds.

props.Name: Entangle
props.Dev_Notes: Ideally, it should only block moving/attacking, and give Cut Loose action.
props.Description: If the target fails a Reflex roll against {2}, it acquires {1} Ensnare counters, which will force it to spend Action points cutting them off (using Agility) until none are left.

props.Name: Rapid Growth
props.Description: {summoned_turns_in_game} Creates a Tree Sapling on target cell that continues to grow by {1}% of its Toughness, Endurance and Armor

props.Name: Regeneration
props.Actives: Cont Mod Param by Simple Const(@,Endurance regen,{1});
props.Description: Targets receives {1} Endurance Regeneration for {2} rounds.

props.Name: Awaken Treant
props.Description: Transforms target Tree into a Treant that will aid you in battle.

props.Name: Bark Skin
props.Actives: Cont Mod Param by Simple Const(Fortified,Toughness,{1});
props.Description: Targets receives {1} bonus Toughness for {2} rounds.

props.Name: Feral Mark
props.Description: Increases target's Agility and Dexterity by {1}% for {2} turns.

props.Name: Feral Impulse
props.Description: Adds 1 Action point and restores {1} Stamina to the target unit.

props.Name: Giant Growth
props.Description: Increases target's Vitality and Strength by {1}% and Weight by the same amount. Also makes the unit Tall or normal if it was Short. Lasts for {2} turns.

props.Name: Predator Instincts
props.Description: Adds {1}% to the target's Stealth and Detection scores for {2} turns.

props.Name: Predator Instincts: Owl Eye
props.Description: Adds {1}% to the target's Stealth and Detection scores for {2} turns.

props.Name: Feral Impulse: Rage
props.Description: Adds 1 Action point and restores {1} Stamina to the target unit.

props.Name: Summon Animal
props.Description: Increases target's Agility and Dexterity by {1}% for {2} turns.

props.Name: Summon Dire Animal
props.Description: Increases target's Agility and Dexterity by {1}% for {2} turns.

props.Name: Rejuvenation
props.Actives: Cont Mod Param by Simple Const(Endurance regeneration,{1});
props.Description: Targets receives {1} Endurance Regeneration for {2} rounds.

props.Name: Tree Thicket
props.Description: Trees will sprout new Saplings randomly.

props.Name: Awaken the Beast
props.Description: Grants target Rage {1} - making it accumulate Rage counters upon each hit taken, which in turn increase Damage, Initiative and Spellpower at the cost of reduced Defense and potential Berserk behavior.

props.Name: Primordial Roar
props.Description: Increases target's Vitality and Strength by {1}% for {2} turns.

props.Name: Call of the Wild
props.Description: Increases target's Vitality and Strength by {1}% for {2} turns.

props.Name: Entangle: Naturalize
props.Description: Target unit loses ability to move and {1}% of its Defense. Lasts {2} turns;

props.Name: Dominate Beast
props.Description: Increases target's Vitality and Strength by {1}% for {2} turns.

props.Name: Steam Shock
props.Description: Deals {1} Water damage and applies {2} Moist counters to the target.

props.Name: Ice Shock
props.Description: Deals {1} Water damage and applies {2} Moist counters to the target.

props.Name: Electric Grasp: Stun
props.Description: Deals {1} Air damage to an adjacent unit. Reflex roll won by the target reduces damage by half.

props.Name: Blistering Wind
props.Description: Deals {1} Sonic damage and reduces Focus by {2} for all units on the 3 adjacent cells in front of the caster plus the cell 2 spaces away in front.

props.Name: Chilling WInd
props.Description: Deals {1} Sonic damage and reduces Focus by {2} for all units on the 3 adjacent cells in front of the caster plus the cell 2 spaces away in front.

props.Name: Pestulent Wind
props.Description: Deals {1} Sonic damage and reduces Focus by {2} for all units on the 3 adjacent cells in front of the caster plus the cell 2 spaces away in front.

props.Name: Giant Growth: Trample
props.Description: Increases target's Vitality and Strength by {1}%, Weight by twice the amount, adds Trample and makes the unit Huge. Lasts for {2} turns.

props.Name: Feral Mark: Charge
props.Description: Increases target's Agility and Dexterity by {1}% for {2} turns.

props.Name: Neutralize Poison
props.Description: Removes up to {1} Poison counters

props.Name: Stabilize
props.Description: Removes up to {1} Bleeding counters

props.Name: Remedy
props.Dev_Notes: Catharsis
props.Description: Removes up to {1} Disease and Corrosion counters

props.Name: Sting
props.Dev_Notes: Ideally, it should only block moving/attacking, and give Cut Loose action.
props.Description: Shoots a poisoned needle at a target.

props.Name: Insect Swarm
props.Dev_Notes: Ideally, it should only block moving/attacking, and give Cut Loose action.
props.Description: Shoots a poisoned needle at a target.

props.Name: Fissure
props.Dev_Notes: Lava Traps , Lava torrent sync
props.Description: Creates an impassible ground obstacle. If the cell is occupied, caster must win a roll of Spellpower against Weight for each unit for Collision rule to be applied (unit will be displaced randomly).

props.Name: Clay Blob
props.Dev_Notes: forcing them to make a Reflex roll against Entanglement
props.Description: A blob of clay is thrown at the target, dealing minor Bludgeoning damage and putting {2} Clay counters on them that will add Weight until falling off (up to 3 per round).

props.Name: Quick Sand
props.Description: Units on the chosen cell will make a Reflex roll against Entanglement X after each action and round, where X equals {1}+ the unit's Weight divided by {2}.

props.Name: Ash Spear
props.Description: Conjures a fearsome lance of deathly ash that pierces targets in a chosen direction, dealing {1} Death damage that cannot be healed. Units killed by the Ash Spear are Annihilated. Undead creatures are healed by Ash Spear instead.

props.Name: Dust Cloud
props.Description: Units within radius of {2} from the chosen cell must make a roll of Fortitude against Suffocation {1} (losing of {1}% of max Endurance and Focus) after each action they take as well as at the start of each new round.

props.Name: Solidify
props.Actives: Cont Mod Param by Const(Stone Skin,Armor,10,2,1,40)
props.Dev_Notes: converts Clay counters into Entanglement counters
props.Description: Converts up to {1} Clay counter into Encase counters or Grease into Clay. For each Encase counter, target gains 1 Armor, 1 Weight and loses 2% maximum Action Points, Attack and Defense. Targets with more than 50 Encase counters are made into Constructs (immune to Mind-Affecting, Poison, etc - such effects are dispeled) and Immobilized it. Encase counters will be lost when target takes Physical damage.

props.Name: Grease Spray
props.Description: Units on the chosen cell will receive {1} Grease counters; their Fire resistance is reduced by 3 per each, while Acid, Lightning and Cold resistances are increased by 1 and Movement Costs by 2%.

props.Name: Clay Wall
props.Description: Erects a wall of solid ice on a cell with at least 500 space and 50 Moist counters (units will be encased until the wall is destroyed). Wall's maximum Toughness is equal to {2}*Freeze Counters on it and it converts up to {1} Moist counters on it (initial 50) to Freeze counters and applies {3}% of its Freeze counters to all adjacent units at the start of each new round. Units cased in the Ice Wall lose {4}% Endurance per round.

props.Name: Stone Spikes
props.Description: Deals {1} Piercing damage to all ground units in a 3x3 zone. Each Fissure in the area will deal {2} Slashing damage to adjacent units.

props.Name: Summon Vampire Bat
props.Description: Vampire Bat with Life Steal and Darkvision, grants summoner bonus Agility while it is alive.

props.Name: Drain Life
props.Description: Drains {1} Endurance from the target.

props.Name: Contagion
props.Description: Target receives {1} Disease counters. Each counter drains 0.2 stamina per turn and deals Poison damage equal to 0.5% of maximum Endurance.

props.Name: Soul Web
props.Ai_Priority_Formula: [AV(Filter List Size, adjacent AND enemy AND unit)]*25+ [more][capacity] {target_c_essence}
props.Description: For every living unit that is slain within {spell_range} from you, gain an amount of Soul Counters equal to its Level and Essence equal to {1}% of its Power. Lasts {2} turns.

props.Name: Raise Skeleton
props.Description: Raise target corpse as a Skeleton or a Skeletal Beast. Skeleton will have the same items equipped. Each Undead minion drains some of your Essence at the start of each turn and will be destroyed if you cannot feed it. Furthermore, if your Focus drops below that which the spell required to cast, the Undead minion will become Neutral.

props.Name: Vampiric Hunger
props.Dev_Notes: PerTurn(AddParam(C_Endurance , -{2}))
props.Description: Grants the target Vampirism - ability to regenerate Endurance with melee attacks ({1}% of damage dealt) for {2} rounds.

props.Name: Slow Venom
props.Description: Target receives {1} Poison counters.

props.Name: Bone Shield
props.Description: Use a corpse within {radius} to create a Bone Shield around target unit within {range}. The Shield will absorb up to {1} physical damage and has {?} resistance and armor.

props.Name: Wraith Form
props.Description: You become Immaterial - all physical damage is affected by your Resistance while Attack/Defense/Armor values have no effect on the damage. You also become immune to Critical Attacks, while still able to Dodge strikes from low-Attack enemies. Lasts {1} rounds.

props.Name: Blood Lust
props.Description: Target receives {1} bonus to Attack, but loses equal amount of its Defense. Lasts {2} rounds.

props.Lore: Bolts are the simplest form of any magic, raw aspect energy hurled at an enemy...
props.Name: Death Bolt
props.Description: Deals {1} Death damage to an enemy in clear shot.

props.Name: Spreading Contagion
props.Description: Afflicted units will add Disease counters to all adjacent units at the end of turn. Each counters deals {1} Poison damage per turn.

props.Name: Drain Life: Bleeding
props.Description: Drains {1} Endurance from the target.

props.Name: Drain Life: Venom
props.Description: Drains {1} Endurance from the target.

props.Name: Pain
props.Description: Target loses an amount of Initiative equal to {1}% of its missing Endurance.

props.Group: Target's initiative is modified by {1}% of its missing Endurance. Has inverse effect on Undead creatures.
props.Name: Agony
props.Description: Target loses an amount of Initiative equal to {1}% of its missing Endurance.

props.Name: Boiling Blood
props.Dev_Notes: Units in a 3x3 zone become {1}% more effective to use Life Steal against and suffer that much more damage from Poison effects. They also lose Focus equal to {1}% of their current Endurance.
props.Description: Target unit with more

props.Name: Blood Channel
props.Description: Tranfers {1} Endurance from you to the target.

props.Name: Wraith Touch
props.Description: Deals {1} Death damage to an adjacent enemy.

props.Name: Bone Splinters
props.Description: Destroys target Skeleton and deals Piercing damage equal to {1}% of its maximum Toughness to all adjacent units. Enemy Skeletons have twice the normal chance to resist Bone Splinters, but their Death Resistance is ignored.

props.Name: Raise Skeleton: Blood Hunger
props.Description: Blood hungry undead are more dangerouns adversaries, but also more dangerous puppets for the necromancer to handle... (will turn on you in you run out of Essence for upkeep!)

props.Name: Chilling Touch
props.Description: Deals {1} Cold damage to an adjacent enemy and applies {2} Freeze counters.

props.Name: Soul Assumption
props.Description: Destroys target Wraith and deals Death damage equal to {1}% of its maximum Essence to all adjacent units. Enemy Wraiths have twice the normal chance to resist Soul Assumption, but their Death Resistance is ignored.

props.Name: Reaper Form
props.Description: Gain twice as many Soul counters.

props.Name: Vampiric Web
props.Description: For every living unit that is slain within {spell_range} from you, gain an amount of Soul Counters equal to its Level and Essence equal to {1}% of its Power.

props.Name: Cheat Death
props.Description: Grants the target Undying {1}.

props.Name: Ghost Walk
props.Description: Undying

props.Name: Cannibalism
props.Description: Grants the target Vampirism - ability to regenerate Endurance with melee attacks ({1}% of damage dealt) for {2} rounds.

props.Name: Death Coil
props.Description: Deals {1} Death damage to an adjacent enemy or heals that much Endurance and Toughness for an undead minion.

props.Lore: Bolts are the simplest form of any magic, raw aspect energy hurled at an enemy...
props.Name: Acid Bolt
props.Description: Deals {1} Death damage to an enemy in clear shot.

props.Name: Plague Cloud
props.Description: Target 3x3 zone is afflicted so that units entering or ending the round in it get {1} Disease counters. Lasts {spell_duration} turns.

props.Name: Death Cloud
props.Actives: AddBuff with trigger(s) - can I wrap it?
props.Description: Target 3x3 zone is afflicted so that units will get {1} Disease counters for entering or starting the round in it. Lasts {spell_duration} turns.

props.Name: Hallucinogetic Venom
props.Description: Target receives {1} Poison counters.

props.Name: Blood Frenzy
props.Description: Target receives an amount of Rage counters equal to {1}% of its missing Endurance (percentage).

props.Name: Plague
props.Description: Targets in a 3x3 zone receive {1} Disease counters. Each counter drains 0.2 stamina per turn and deals Poison damage equal to 0.5% of maximum Endurance.

props.Name: Corpse Explosion
props.Description: Destroys target corpse and deals Physical damage equal to {1}% of its maximum Endurance to all adjacent units.

props.Name: Raise Ghost
props.Description: Raise target corpse as a Ghost or a Wraith Beast. Ghost will have the same spells available. Each Undead minion drains some of your Essence at the start of each turn and will be destroyed if you cannot feed it. Furthermore, if your Focus drops below that which the spell required to cast, the Undead minion will become Neutral.

props.Name: Revenant
props.Dev_Notes: max level?
props.Description: Raise target corpse as its own former self with Undead classification. Each Undead minion drains some of your Essence at the start of each turn and will be destroyed if you cannot feed it. Furthermore, if your Focus drops below that which the spell required to cast, the Undead minion will become Neutral.

props.Name: Vampiric Hunger: Bloodcraze
props.Description: Grants the target Vampirism - ability to regenerate Endurance with melee attacks ({1}% of damage dealt) for {2} rounds.

props.Name: Death Nova
props.Description: All units within 1 cell radius from the caster take {1} Death damage.

props.Name: Protective Sphere
props.Description: Increase target's resistance

props.Lore: Bolts are the simplest form of any magic, raw aspect energy hurled at an enemy...
props.Name: Arcane Bolt
props.Description: Deals {1} Arcane damage to an enemy in clear shot.

props.Name: Unsummon
props.Description: Destroy target unit. Its summoner receives back the amount of Essence equal to the unit's Endurance times Magical Affinity

props.Name: Ray of Arcanum
props.Description: Sends forth a ray of Arcane energies that deals {1} damage to all units in the chosen direction within {spell_range} cells' distance.

props.Name: Teleport
props.Description: Teleports target unit within {1} distance to a cell within the same distance. Enemy units will attempt a saving throw of Resistance versus Spellpower.

props.Name: Sorcerous Flame
props.Description: The air around you turned into eldritch flames, dealing {1} Arcane damage to all adjacent units.

props.Name: Time Warp
props.Std_Bools: C Value Over Maximum;Invert On Enemy
props.Description: Warps the fabric of time around target unit, modifying its current Initiative by {1}.

props.Name: Force Field
props.Description: Creates a solid barrier that blocks movement and missiles but not vision. Spellpower and Mastery increase its Endurance, Toughness, Armor and Resistances. Will be destroyed immediately on any action from the conjurer.
props.Passives: OnCast(CustomTarget(summoned, AddProp(Passives, OnHit(Conditional(Ref(summoner, event_source), CustomTarget(source, InstantDeath)))))

props.Name: Iron Fist
props.Description: Deals {1} Bludgeoning damage to an enemy in clear shot.

props.Name: Conjure Weapon
props.Description: Conjures a simple Steel weapon of your choice with {1}% of Durability.

props.Name: Conjure Golem
props.Description: Conjures an Iron Golem automata with {1} Action Points to spend.

props.Name: Conjure Armor
props.Dev_Notes: test2
props.Description: Conjures a simple Steel Armor item of your choice with {1}% of Durability.

props.Name: Conjure Automata
props.Dev_Notes: test
props.Description: Conjures an Iron Golem automata with additional {1} Action Points. Automata units do not restore Action Points.

props.Lore: Bolts are the simplest form of any magic, raw aspect energy hurled at an enemy...
props.Name: Arcane Bolt: Elemental
props.Description: Upgraded Arcane Bolt that deals {2}% additional damage as Fire, Water and Air each.

props.Name: Conjure Armor: Adamantium
props.Description: Conjures a simple Steel Armor item of your choice with {1}% of Durability.

props.Name: Enchant Weapon
props.Dev_Notes: 1st use works fine, 2nd use kills the game.
props.Description: Choose a single-target spell to put on target weapon so that it will activate it upon each successful hit. Weapon has {X} energy and {Y} spellpower.

props.Name: Confusion
props.Description: Target will makes a roll against Mind Affecting and if it fails, will act randomly for {2} turns. Succeeding the roll still results in {1} Action Point loss.

props.Name: Glyph
props.Description: Choose a single-target or zone-targeting spell and create a trap that will activate it on whoever steps onto it.

props.Name: Hypnosis
props.Description: Target living creature in clear shot makes a saving throw of Willpower versus {2} against mind control and becomes loyal to the caster for {spell_duration} turns if it fails.

props.Name: Illusion
props.Description: Creates a copy of a target unit with less than {1} Power on a cell adjacent to it and swaps their positions one time out of two. The copy is identical, but will be destroyed if it takes non-triggered damage. Lasts {2} turns.

props.Name: Time Theft
props.Description: Steals {1} Initiative from the target. Adds that much time to the round's Remaining Time.

props.Name: Blink
props.Description: Teleports the caster to a free cell within a distance of {1}.

props.Lore: Bolts are the simplest form of any magic, raw aspect energy hurled at an enemy...
props.Name: Arcane Bolt: Astral
props.Description: Upgraded Arcane Bolt that deals {2}% additional damage as Shadow, Light and Chaos each.

props.Name: Iron Fist: Bash
props.Description: Reduces target's Initiative and Focus by {2} in addition to doing {1} Bludgeoning damage.

props.Lore: Bolts are the simplest form of any magic, raw aspect energy hurled at an enemy...
props.Name: Arcane Bolt: Eldritch
props.Description: Upgraded Arcane Bolt that deals {2}% additional damage as pure Magic.

props.Name: Sorcerous Blast
props.Description: Invokes an eldritch lightning that deals {1} Arcane damage to all units in a 3x3 zone centered on the chosen location.

props.Name: Swap
props.Description: Teleports target unit within {1} distance to a cell within the same distance.

props.Name: Time Lapse
props.Std_Bools: C Value Over Maximum;Invert On Enemy
props.Description: Steals {1} Initiative from the target. Adds that much time to the round's Remaining Time.

props.Name: Eldritch Blast
props.Description: Invokes an eldritch lightning that strikes at the chosen location and deals {1} Arcane damage to all units adjacent to it.

props.Name: Misstep
props.Actives: Roll(Mind Affecting, Random(ForceAction(Turn Clockwise) OR ForceAction(Turn Anticlockwise)), AddParam(C_Focus, -{1}));
props.Description: Target makes a roll against Mind Affecting and if it is failed, will make a random Turn action the next time it becomes active. Succeeding the roll still results in {1} Focus reduction. Only 25% of target's Resistance applies versus Misstep.

props.Name: Conjure Potion
props.Description: Conjures a simple Steel weapon of your choice with {1}% of Durability.

props.Name: Enchant Armor
props.Description: Choose a single-target spell to put on target weapon so that it will activate it upon each successful hit. Weapon has {X} energy and {Y} spellpower.

props.Name: Spell Matrix
props.Description: Target receives a {1} bonus Spellpower and Resistance for {2} turns.

props.Name: Conjure Column
props.Dev_Notes: AddProp(Passives, OnHit(Conditional(Ref(summoner, event_source), InstantDeath))
props.Description: Creates a solid barrier that blocks movement and missiles but not vision. Spellpower and Mastery increase its Endurance, Toughness, Armor and Resistances. Will be destroyed immediately on any action from the conjurer.

props.Name: Force Field: Protective Line

props.Name: Force Field: Protective Circle
props.Description: Creates a solid barrier that blocks movement and missiles but not vision. Spellpower and Mastery increase its Endurance, Toughness, Armor and Resistances. Will be destroyed immediately on any action from the conjurer.

props.Name: Vertigo
props.Actives: Roll(Mind Affecting, Random(ForceAction(Turn Clockwise) OR ForceAction(Turn Anticlockwise)), AddParam(C_Focus, -{1}));
props.Description: Target makes a roll against Mind Affecting and if it is failed, will make a random Turn action the next time it becomes active. Succeeding the roll still results in {1} Focus reduction.

props.Name: Sentient Weapon
props.Description: Choose a single-target spell to put on target weapon so that it will activate it upon each successful hit. Weapon has {X} energy and {Y} spellpower.

props.Name: Control Construct
props.Description: Target receives a {1} bonus Spellpower and Resistance for {2} turns.

props.Name: Misstep: Stumble
props.Actives: Roll(Mind Affecting, Random(ForceAction(Turn Clockwise) OR ForceAction(Turn Anticlockwise)), AddParam(C_Focus, -{1}));
props.Description: Target makes a roll against Mind Affecting and if it is failed, will make a random Turn action the next time it becomes active. Succeeding the roll still results in {1} Focus reduction.

props.Description: Choose a single-target or zone-targeting spell and create a trap that will activate it on whoever steps onto it.

props.Name: Enchant Weapon: Debuff
props.Description: Choose a single-target spell to put on target weapon so that it will activate it upon each successful hit. Weapon has {X} energy and {Y} spellpower.

props.Description: Choose a single-target spell to put on target weapon so that it will activate it upon each successful hit. Weapon has {X} energy and {Y} spellpower.

props.Description: Target receives a {1} bonus Spellpower and Resistance for {2} turns.

props.Name: Glyph: Dimension Gate
props.Description: Choose a single-target or zone-targeting spell and create a trap that will activate it on whoever steps onto it.

props.Name: Mania
props.Description: Target will makes a roll against Mind Affecting and if it fails, will act randomly for {2} turns. Succeeding the roll still results in {1} Action Point loss.

props.Name: Brain Lock
props.Description: The target will keep hitting itself with basic attack until it dies or wins a roll vs. Mind-Affection.

props.Name: Sonic Blast
props.Description: The air around you explodes in eldritch flames, dealing {1} Arcane damage to all adjacent units.

props.Name: Iron Fist: Steel From Above

props.Description: Deals {1} Bludgeoning damage to an enemy in clear shot.

props.Name: Gravity Pull
props.Description: Invokes an eldritch lightning that deals {1} Arcane damage to all units in a 3x3 zone centered on the chosen location.

props.Name: Spell-Enchant Armor
props.Description: Choose a single-target spell to put on target weapon so that it will activate it upon each successful hit. Weapon has {X} energy and {Y} spellpower.

props.Name: Conjure Spyglass
props.Description: Conjures a useful contraption which grants you +1 behind sight and reduces your side sight penalty by 1.

props.Description: Conjures a simple Steel weapon of your choice with {1}% of Durability.
